actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House with respect to a reorganization of the Internal Revenue Service.

summary.text: States that the Commissioner of the Internal Revenue Service should not implement the proposed reorganization of certain Internal Revenue Service district offices until the appropriate committees of Congress have had an opportunity to hold hearings on the proposal.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House with respect to a reorganization of the Internal Revenue Service.
